Reviews.Content: terrible The hotel forgot to pick us up from the airport, and refused to drop us off without paying extra, even though this was organised the day before. The breakfast was reasonable, and restaraunt staff were friendly. The front counter staff were not at all helpful. The rooms were bad even by bali standards, bathroom was pretty disgusting, the superior room was tiny. The pool and courtyard area was ok. Everytime we ran out of toilet paper we had to go and ask for more. Location was ok.
Reviews.Author: KrystaG

Reviews.Content: i wanna choose lees than terrible but no choice..... i just wanna share about my experience bout this hotel......really.. this hotel is very very bad and suck.... TERRIBLE !!!i'm regret to know and stay in this hotel.... BALI MATAHARI !!hope your owner read this and change all your staff attitude !!!just my 2 cents.......
Reviews.Author: cakotai

Reviews.Content: Bali Matahari Hotel - Strongly Not Recomended       this is when the bath room ceiling was broken
Reviews.Author: anny27

Reviews.Content: Friendly hotel Stayed in Bali Matahari twice and it was strongly recommended by a friend who stayed here on her annual trips to Bali.Rooms are simple,clean, friendly staff with a homely atmosphere. Breakfast is very simple. with restaurant serve for Indonesian and international menu. and don't forget the pool with gazebo.Will be there again in December.
Reviews.Author: WayanRobi
